meaning_str.bing:
n. 供电
adj. 电的；用电的；电动的；发电的
网络. 导电的；带电的；电气

电的；用电的；电动的；发电的

电的；带电的；电动的；发电的；电气化的；令人激动的；紧张的；刺激的；电力驱动的；电力相关的
供电；电力系统；电力装置

1.en: So would the huge cost advantage ever lead her to trade in her Mazda for an electric car?
1.cn: 那么，差别如此之大的行驶成本优势是否会使她放弃马自达汽车转而青睐电动汽车呢？

2.en: But in the evaporation cooled electric machine the heat can be transferred by the two-phase flow of the coolant with low boiling point.
2.cn: 蒸发冷却技术利用低沸点介质受热后汽化形成两相流，使电机冷却。

3.en: President Barack Obama has said he would like to see one million electric vehicles on U. S. roads by the middle of the next decade.
3.cn: 美国总统奥巴马曾表示，他希望未来五年左右，美国公路上的电动汽车能达到100万辆。

0.en: Her thing is neuro-electric interfacing, telekinesis mental manipulation.
0.cn: 女的通过神经电接触，能心灵遥感精神控制。

1.en: No. Electric rotisserie! If god wants a hamburger, this is what she cooks it on.
1.cn: 不，这是电转烤肉架，如果上帝想吃汉堡，她肯定是用这个来烤肉。

2.en: Is that the electrode? That is the electrode. So basically, there's a big electric current running through that thing?
2.cn: 这就是电极？是的，这就是电极从根本上说现在有电穿过这个东西？

3.en: My pleasure. For a non-physicist, you have a remarkable grasp of how electric dipoles in the brain's water molecules could not possibly form a Bose condensate.
3.cn: 我很荣幸。作为非物理学家您对大脑水分子中的电偶极子难以形成玻色凝聚物的原因理解得非常到位。

4.en: There is an electric match, together with the shell. When the electric match ignites, the shell is going to propel from the launch tube.
4.cn: 烟花弹配有电子火柴。一旦电子火柴打火，烟花弹就从发射管升空。

5.en: Right now, you're looking at the furnace, the electric arc furnace.
5.cn: 现在,你看着这个熔炉这个电弧炉。

6.en: Yes, and I can start to control other peoples' bodies. Also, I can control magnetic and electric waves.
6.cn: 可以，我也开始可以控制别人的身体，我还可以控制电磁波。

7.en: I just got used to being hot and sweaty all the time. This electric furnace is key to Nucor's innovative strategy.
7.cn: 我觉得很热,一直在流汗。这个电弧炉是钢铁公司主要的创新产品。

8.en: Because last month, I sent the electric company a Starbucks gift card, an apology note, and a few snapshots of me in a bra.
8.cn: 因为上个月我给电力公司寄了张星巴克礼品卡，一封道歉信和一些我穿着胸罩的照片。

9.en: Once we paint it, we furnish it, we fix the electric, redo the plumbing, and figure out why that brown spot won't stop growing.
9.cn: 只等我们刷上漆，配上家具，修好电路，重新铺好水管，搞清楚那块棕色斑点为何还在变大就行。

10.en: When completed, this integrated electric highway is set to stretch from more than 12,000 miles, half of the earth's circumference.
10.cn: 当这套系统建成，这个高度整合的电力高速网将会绵延近两万公里，相当于绕地球半圈。

11.en: It is bed time. I'm a bit sad that my shadow's gone away. Don't be sad, Peppa. Electric light can make shadows, and we can make shadow puppets.
11.cn: 睡觉的时间到了。我有一点难过因为我的影子不见了。别难过，佩奇。电灯也能让影子出现，我们还能玩手影游戏。

12.en: And she knows as well as I do that electric shock can cause death of tissues which could start a whole inflammatory cascade unless I debride what's been damaged.
12.cn: 她和我都知道，电流致死的组织会引起严重感染，除非我现在切除坏死组织。

13.en: Well, in actuality, what your equipment detected wasn't so much evidence of paradigm shifting monopoles as it was static from the electric can opener we were turning on and off.
13.cn: 其实，你的仪器侦测的数据不是范式转变单极子的证据，那是电动开罐刀具的静电，我们在不停开关。

14.en: On September 4, 1882, visionary inventor Thomas Edison switched on America's first central power plant, delivering electricity to 400 electric bulbs in less than one square mile of the city.
14.cn: 1882年9月4日，发明家托马斯·爱迪生，启动了美国第一个发电站，给400个电灯供电，供电面积不到1平方英里。

15.en: Look. It's simplicity itself. You just turn on the gas, hit the electric starter. Hit the electric starter.
15.cn: 你看，很简单的，打开气阀，点火，点火。

16.en: Welcome, Skipper, Kowalski and rooting-tooting Rico! The gang's all here. The mood is electric. Is this really, finally everybody?
16.cn: 欢迎，老大，科沃斯基，还有淘气鬼瑞哥！大伙儿全在这儿，真是太刺激了！这是真的吗，终于齐全了？

17.en: Hi. I'm Leonard. And you are beautiful. You pop, sparkle and buzz electric. I'm going to pick you up at 8:00, show you a night you will never forget.
17.cn: 你好啊，我叫莱纳德，你宛若天仙一般，青春，奔放，热力四射，我晚上8点钟去接你，定会带给你一个永生难忘的夜晚。
